name: Task Donegeon - 0.0.69 - Bulk Management & AI Helper
lastChange: Added bulk management (delete, status change) for Quests, Items, and Trophies. Introduced new marketplaces (Bank, Experiences, Candy) with new items. Enhanced the AI Studio with separated Duty/Venture generation and increased quantity. Added an AI Image Prompt Helper to the Asset Manager. Added 30+ new trophies and improved the Calendar Chronicles view.
description: A gamified task and chore tracker for families and groups. Complete quests, earn currency and experience, and level up your character in a fun, medieval-themed adventure.
